title: Multidisciplinary Engineering Design Project Management Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of engineering design, basic project management principles, and interdisciplinary collaboration experience
context.additional_context: In-service professionals learn multidisciplinary approaches to solve real engineering design problems through smartphone-enabled collaboration in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Collaborating effectively with multidisciplinary team members, deliverables meeting over 80% of engineering design project requirements can be produced.
Make and evaluate design decisions considering technical, sociopolitical, and economic constraints at least three times
Achieve a weekly task progress rate of 95% or higher using mobile-based collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
